thilanijathika chithra katha padaname shilpin asu denekuge chithra athulath chithra pradarshanaya ‘siththaru andi ru - 2’ mema masa 27, 28, 29 saha 30 yana dinayanhi kolambaa layanal wendat kalagarayedi pawathwe.shri lankawen bihi wu chithra katha shilpinge ekama ekamuthuwa wana jathika chithra katha padanama mema pradarshanaya sanwidhanaya karanu labayi.meyata samagamiwa ‘toks and joks’ namin masika keti chithra katha sangrahayak elidakwimata da katayuthu sampadanaya kara thiibe.wiwidha mathruka yatathe chithra nirmana 200 kin pamana samanwitha ‘siththaru andi ru - 2’ narambaima sandaha merata chithra lolinta sanwidhayaka kamituwa wiwrutha aaradhanawak karayi.-prasadprasanna withanagege nawathama sinama kruthiya wana oba nathuwa oba ekka rusiyawe this pas wani moskaw anthar jathika sinama uleledi me dinawala thiragatha we.ehi mangala darshanaya 20 wanida pawathwu athara 29 wanida chithrapataya pradarshanaya wimata niyamithaya.-prasad
